message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this reflects its true worth, but I'm open to discussing further.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $1,300,000. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,075,000. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering the value I see in the product.
